Afri Food Network nke a maara nke ọma dị ka African Food Network bụ ebe nrụọrụ weebụ a raara nye nri na ndụ ndị Africa
Kevin Eze malitere saịtị ahụ na Jenụwarị na afọ 2017 na Abuja, Naịjirịa.

African Food Network malitere dị ka naanị ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nwere ihe na-erughị ntụziaka 50 na 2017 ma ugbu a otu n'ime nnukwu ntụziaka nri nri Africa n'ịntanetị nwere ihe karịrị ntụziaka 500 sitere n'aka ndị edemede dị iche iche. E mepụtara African Food Network iji kọwaa echiche ụwa banyere nri Africa, nri na nri ọdịnala nke onye guzobere ya kwuru.
